reviews.review: FPS游戏还是要找基友一起玩，一个人的游戏总是孤单的
This game was FANTASTIC I mean the graphics are good,gameplay is smooth but there is ALOT of hackers and kids who swear at you for killing them

Don't get CSGO unless you have friends you can play comp with. People think it's funny to constantly kick team members. Then you get banned for a week. Then you start playing again and its only a matter of a few games before random people kick you again and you have to wait another week to play comp.

Love the game but sadly people have to hack to win. 10/10 though

Legendary franchise. Probably nothing can go wrong. Great experience for those who are passionated about fps gaming. CS:GO will bring your experience to another level. However, head up that valve is still working with the community to eliminate those so-called hackers. Nonetheless, its a great game where great people meet and just simply have fun. 10/10

Если у тебя стальной пукан или прямые руки с быстрими рефлексами, то играй смело. Но учти тебе придеться тащить всю тиму, ибо это ракообразная команда не сможет убить в спинну или сольется одному человеку с лоу хп. Моя оценка 9Горящих пуканов из 15.А да чуть не забыл, читеров дохрена в этой игре.
